comment.author: 34275629@N04
comment._content: This picture is incorrectly listed as Hardangerfjord. It shows Stalheimskleiva, in Nærøydalen. Those mountain profiles are easily recognizable: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/klareralt/2646841030/]

comment.author: 34301718@N06
comment._content: Yes, and it looks like the picture is taken at the Stalheim hotel area (stone fence in background is there today).

comment.author: 11814739@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Atmospheric perspective - Blåner, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 34405198@N02
comment._content: And we are not at Hardanger Fjord this time either. We are looking down the valley Naeroydalen which ends at Naeroyfjorden (Word Heritage), a branch of Sognefjorden.
